about.paragraph: I always enjoy the technology, the more a knew about it and the time passed that joy become in love. Eventually i studied Electronic Engineer, and in my free time i used for learn Web Development. Once get the Degree i found a job in the software industrie, since then i`m focus on every day in become a better profesional and person.
